cast.name: 保罗·怀特豪斯 Paul Whitehouse

this_title: Paul Whitehouse: Our Troubled Rivers Season 1
introduction: In Paul Whitehouse: Our Troubled Rivers, Paul travels around England and Wales exploring the issues facing our rivers, and how water companies and intensive agriculture are serving to exacerbate these problems.Series 1: Episode 1Paul Whitehouse travels through the north of England, looking at the impact water companies have on its rivers.Series 1: Episode 2Paul continues his journey, travelling to Wales and the south of England. Visiting the River Wye, he sees how explosions of algae are part of a cocktail overwhelming the habitat.
chinese_title: Paul Whitehouse: Our Troubled Rivers Season 1
